import './App.css'; import { experiences } from './experiences'; import { useState } from 'react'; import headshot from "./images/IG_headshot.png"; function App() { const [tab, setState] = useState("experience"); function changeTab(e) { e.preventDefault(); setState(e.currentTarget.textContent); } return (

hello, i'm hannah.

email

github

linkedin

i am a junior at MIT studying computer science with a concentration in linguistics. i enjoy taking on creative and challenging projects, and i am especially passionate about spreading my love for technology to others through education.

experience

my interests

{tab === "experience" ?

{d.company}
{d.dates}

{d.location}
{d.summary}
)}
:

here are few of the things i've found interesting or want to explore!

what i enjoy:

  • creating platforms with and for users
  • reading books
  • writing novellas and short stories
  • making spotify playlists
  • exploring linguistics and other languages

what i want to explore:

  • creative applications in programming (i.e. creating apps in Unity)
  • learning Blender
  • upcycling clothes
  • archery -- took a class and i really enjoyed it!
}
); } export default App;
